name: BSEF AISBL - The International Bromine Council
membership:
BSEF is an affiliate of CEFIC, the European Chemical Council
BSEF is a member of the European Risk Forum
goal:
BSEF is the voice of the bromine technology industry globally. our goals are to:
Promote the benefits of bromine and bromine technologies for society and economy
Commission and disseminate science on bromine and bromine technologies
Represent the bromine technology sector globally
Support BSEF members and market organizations in their engagement with policy makers and regulatory authorities
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Energy Policy
EU RTD Policy
EU Environment Policy
EU Industrial development and trade policies
